I generate an accessibility analysis report

I click the "create" button
I am directed to the "create contact" page

I generate an accessibility analysis report

I click the "1st" "edit" button

I am directed to the "home" page
I fill in the "search" input with "Tony Bongo"
the "contact" should not be displayed

I click the "save" button
the "error message" should contain the text "Error: The "phone" field can't be empty."
I fill in the "phone" input with "939-555-0912"
I click the "save" button
the "error message" should contain the text "Error: The "street" field can't be empty."
I fill in the "street" input with "742 Evergreen Terrace"
I click the "save" button
the "error message" should contain the text "Error: The "city" field can't be empty."
I fill in the "city" input with "Springfield"
I click the "save" button
I fill in the "search" input with "Bart Simpson"
the "contact" should be displayed
the "full name label" should contain the text "Name:"
the "name" should equal the text "Bart Simpson"
the "gender label" should contain the text "Gender:"
the "gender" should equal the text "Male"
the "address label" should contain the text "Address:"
the "address" should equal the text "742 Evergreen Terrace, Springfield"
the "edit" should be displayed
the "delete" should be displayed
